turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Today I need your help getting some pizza that I'm looking to order. I need some some help ordering from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. what did u want from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I'm looking to get three pizzas, three large pizzas. I'm wondering if can go just go through which ones I'm looking to get. They're all going to be the same. I'm looking to get Okay, I'm looking to get buffalo chicken, three large buffalo chicken pizzas. So, just chicken with buffalo sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, please do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like Bella Luna has buffalo sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If they don't have buffalo sauce, you can just use tomato sauce, so it'll just be a regular chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did u want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'd like to add mushrooms to all three of those, so it would be a chicken and mushroom pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. so u want 3 large pizzas, all with chicken and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45.22 is the total, did u want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you can go ahead and place the order. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order. it'll b ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. That's good timing for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I don't need anymore help. I think you just covered everything, so thank you for that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, glad to help u. enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I'll try to. Enjoy the rest of your day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure will.
